code: export var loginPersonalAccountActions={ENTER:'enter',LOGIN:'login / change password',ENTEREMAIL:'enter email'};export var ENTER={type:loginPersonalAccountActions.ENTER,loginIsVisible:true,personAccountIsVisible:false};export var LOGIN={type:loginPersonalAccountActions.LOGIN,loginFormIsVisible:true,loginFormLoginPageIsVisible:true,loginFormForgetPasswordIsVisible:false};export var ENTEREMAIL={type:loginPersonalAccountActions.ENTEREMAIL,clientEmail:''};
